family.title: â¤ï¸ Family Focus

relationshipStatus.note: Need to focus on repair. The 5:1 ratio is way off.

family.potencyAction: Give her space if she needs it, then come back with a genuine apology. No defending, no explaining â€” just acknowledging.
family.suggestion: If weather clears up, take Jones to the backyard for some Super Wings pretend play â€” he can 'fly' around while you supervise Jett on a blanket.
family.conversationStarter: Ask Jillian: 'What's been on your mind this week? I want to understand, not fix.'
family.weeklyGoal: Focus on repair this week. Increase acts of service. Create space for her to express frustrations without jumping to solutions.
family.reflection: With Valentine's Day 11 days away, this week is critical for repair. The ratio needs attention before planning anything romantic. Present first, grand gestures later.
